title: Ottawa pursuing technological approaches to COVID-19 contact tracing - CBC.ca
description: Ottawa pursuing technological approaches to COVID-19 contact tracing CBC.ca Ottawa to provide $250 million to prop up strategic innovative firms hurt by COVID-19 Financial Post Navdeep Bains on Ottawa's plan to save Canadian tech amid COVID-19 The Logic COVID…
content:
Innovation Minister Navdeep Bains says the federal government is still trying to work out how Canada can use technology to fight COVID-19 through contact tracing  the critical public health measure of tracking people who may have been exposed to the virus.
